QuestData.Title: Foraging for Fragments
QuestData.Description:
Forgive me. I don't mean to appear ungrateful, but my mirror fragments are missing.
I shouldn't be surprised, really. They're quite powerful and I'm sure the miscreants out here would be happy to get their hands on them.
Nonetheless, I will not let this deter me.
The Master sends his stone servants to smash any mirrors erected in this ward, so we should have no trouble finding fragments nearby.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Laurent and collect Mirror Fragments.
QuestData.RewardText: This must be some sort of mistake!
